title: Why The FTSE 100 Has Plunged But The FTSE 250’s Rallied
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 27, 2015, 09:38 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 52 mins Why The FTSE 100 Has Plunged But The FTSE 250’s Rallied By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk – 1 hour 12 minutes ago 6,102.13 +122.93 
The plunge in global stock markets has been front page news, and indeed the FTSE 100 -- the index of the UK's largest companies -- is technically in correction mode. However that's not the whole story when it comes to UK companies...
